content:
Are there any particular areas of the compiler that are in need of some extra help?

I have worked on a few smaller issues, and I could continue picking up random issues I notice, but if help is needed somewhere, that might be more useful overall.

Iâ€™d like to continue to grow my experience with the compiler, eventually helping with reviews and planning where possible. ðŸ˜„
always happy to see more people on rustdoc if you're interested in that :)
it has tons of bugs that tend to slip under the radar because the team is pretty small
Iâ€™m also interested in diagnostics and incremental compilation.
those don't have streams but you can read about them in https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/query.html and https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/diagnostics.html
there's also a discussion about queries (how incremental compilation is implemented) in https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/131828-t-compiler/topic/question.20about.20perf right now

They both have streams :D Well, at least their working groups, not sure if that is what you had in mind

https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/147480-t-compiler.2Fwg-diagnostics
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/241847-t-compiler.2Fwg-incr-comp
